Virtual6 Ltd are a small family owned IT & Hosting company founded in December 2018. We're based in Rotherham, United Kingdom, but we work with customers and service partners from all around the world.

There are tons of reasons why we think you should choose Virtual6 Ltd for your IT & Hosting requirements. Here are just three of our favorite features:-

**1) QUALITY UK BASED SUPPORT**

Our customer services team are based in-house and located in the United Kingdom, we don't outsource any part of this work. That means you get quality support that is consistent, knowledgeable and provided within a time frame which is set by us. Did you know that we guarantee a response to ALL inquiries within just 3 working hours as standard?

**2) 24/7/365 MONITORING & RESPONSE**

Every part of our network is actively monitored in real time, with issues and downtime automatically reported to our on-call staff member. This monitoring takes place 24/7/365 and our on-call staff also operate 24/7/365 on rotation to deal with any reported problems. Whilst customer services may not be provided out of hours, updates and announcements are provided at our blog.

**3) HONEST & COMPETITIVE PRICING**

We regularly compare our prices with industry leaders and other suppliers to ensure we provide honest yet competitive pricing. In regards to hosting products, we do not oversell our services and you will always be able to utilize what you have paid for. We may not always be the cheapest option on the market, but we are confident that our combination of price, service and support are unrivaled.
